author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: ضَيْتَ لِي بِأَنْ أَرْتَقِيَ إِلَى الرَّفِيقِ الأَبْهى وَالمَلَكُوتِ الأَسْنَی، أَيْ رَبِّ قَرِّبْهُ بِفَ
translation: Thou well knowest, however, O my God, that my wish is wholly dissolved in Thy wish, and that Thou hast irrevocably decreed that my soul should ascend unto the loftiest mansions of Thy Kingdom, and pass into the presence of my all-glorious Companion.
